id: CropWatch® Temperature, Moisture, & EC Soil Sensor
name: CropWatch® Temperature, Moisture, & EC Soil Sensor
tagline: Efficiently monitor CO2 and occupancy for enhanced productivity, health, and well-being
description: The CropWatch® Soil Sensor Series is designed to provide the greatest level of connectivity possible. We have focused on sensor ruggedness to operate in the harshest environments as well as having a long battery life this sensor is ment to be set and left to work for years. We have also worked with farmers to determine the optimal sensors and aim to provide the best possible accuracy and reliability outside of a lab setting.
features: External Antenna that can be extended for better signal
Integrated GPS allowing it to be relocated
Replaceable Sensor in case of damage
